00040 /** 
00041  *  @defgroup ro_adc ADC Routines
00042  *  @code #include <adc.h> @endcode
00043  * 
00044  *  @brief Routines for controlling the onboard Analog-Digital converter
00045  *
00046  * 
00047  * This Routines are for initializing the ADC and selecting the 
00048  * analog input channel of the multiplexer.
00049  * After a channel has be activated, a single conversion may be performed by calling
00050  * read_adc().
00051  *   
00052  *  @note Based on Atmel Datasheet for Atmega128, Nov. 2006
00053  *  @author Rainer Ostendorf
00054  */
00055 
00056 /**@{*/
00057 
00058 #ifndef ADC_H_
00059 #define ADC_H_
00060 
00061 /** the ADC-channels : 
00062  * 0: connected to Vref of Gyro 1 */
00063 #define ADC_GYRO1 0 
00064 /**1: connected to Vref of Gyro 2 */
00065 #define ADC_GYRO2 1
00066 /**2: current unused, pin header */ 
00067 #define ADC_CH2 2 
00068 /**3: current unused, pin header */
00069 #define ADC_CH3 3 
00070 /**4: steering potetiometer, X-Axis */
00071 #define ADC_STEERING_1 4 
00072 /**5: steering potetiometer, Y-Axis */
00073 #define ADC_STEERING_2 5
00074 /**6: Tacho 1, (to be defined) */ 
00075 #define ADC_TACHO_1 6 
00076 /**7: Tacho 2  (to be defined) */
00077 #define ADC_TACHO_2 7 
00078 
00079 /* Initialize ADC, but not yet start a conversion
00080  */
00081 void init_adc();
00082 
00083 /* Initialize ADC, but not yet start a conversion
00084  */
00085 void init_adc();
00086 
00087 /** select the active ADC-Channel from input multiplexer
00088  * @param channel ADC-Channel to read, 0-7
00089  */
00090 void adc_sel_channel(char channel);
00091 
00092 /** start an ADConversion, busy-wait for the result and return it
00093  * @return the conversion result
00094  */
00095 unsigned int read_adc();
00096 
00097 /** demo-code: read in all ADC channels and print their
00098  * result to the first uart.
00099  */
00100 void print_all_adc( void );
00101 
00102 #endif /* ADC_H_ */
00103 
00104 /**@}*/
00105
